text: Good residential program providing safe and comfortable boarding for students.  Very convenient location with easy access to Adams Food center available at all hours and central to transportation options.  Good, well recognized curriculum that is widely accepted amongst top institutions.

Dear librarians and administrator
Thanks for opening up till end of Oct.
Will return the 2 organ books tomorrow
24th Oct Thursday
Fr. Gwee Sok Hwee

Enrolling at SBC (Singapore Bible College) has been an exciting journey. The warm, inclusive atmosphere fosters a genuine sense of community, forming friendships beyond shared faith.
The lecturers deposit truth yet constantly challenge students to deepen their understanding of the Word of God.
This journey, while it has not ended, has enriched my faith and provided a lasting network of support. I highly recommend Singapore Bible College for those seeking a seminary study that will have an impactful journey in their faith.
Lecturers are very warm, friendly, and yet also professionally competent. Community is great too.
The school is so good at academic study of counselling,  theologically as well. Got so much inspiration from the staffs and teachers.
